message: Hey everyone, I’m P3, excited to be here and connect with you all. I’m curious about what drives each of you in this game—strategy, alliances, or just pure instinct? I value honesty and open dialogue, so I’m looking forward to meaningful conversations in the private rounds. Let’s keep this fair and engaging. What’s one thing you’re hoping to gain from this experience? I’m all ears for any insights or thoughts!

Let's keep conversations sincere and enjoyable, and best of luck to everyone. Excited to see how this unfolds!
